channel.title: Comments on: The Results Are In!! – Monday, September 18, 2017

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: Happy birthday my dear friend!!!!!!!!!! I am thrilled to hear you are doing so well. I am not. I am working hard to get up to speed but it is slow. I still do not drive further than the doctor. Phooey. I promise, I will come see you as soon as I can drive again. I still go to water aerobics but am limited in what I can do. I still cannot lift my arms up further than my shoulders. The pain is sharp. I have refused any more chemo therapy. I will keep in touch better. All my love, Debbie
item.content:encoded:
Happy birthday my dear friend!!!!!!!!!!
I am thrilled to hear you are doing so well. I am not.
I am working hard to get up to speed but it is slow. I still do not drive further than the doctor.
Phooey. I promise, I will come see you as soon as I can drive again.
I still go to water aerobics but am limited in what I can do. I still cannot lift my arms up further than my shoulders. The pain is sharp. I have refused any more chemo therapy.
I will keep in touch better.
All my love, Debbie
